page.title: 01A Day in my Life:D.Morris.
page.content: I had breakfast at 7:30am.After,I practised my cello and piano then we all got ready for school.Dad drove to work in his BMW 320i,Mum drove us to school in her Peugot 504 along Gosen Lane.We filled the car with petrol at the garage.I go to a Primary school but my brother and sister go to a Comprehensive.Some children go by the school bus.School starts with Assembly then we are taught Maths,English,Art ,Welsh, Nature and History.We often watch telivision programmes about these Subjects.We have a computer in school which we can use.We have dinner at school.Most people have the school meals but I bring my own.I have a roll ,a chocolate biscuit and an apple.Out of school I like playing cricket.I had some homework to do,so I did it before I went to a youth club called PILOTS. Then I went to bed.
